sentences.sContent: Sometimes, they overcharge or don’t build those parts I have been paying for.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sometimes, they overcharge or don’t build those parts I have been paying for.
sentences.sCn: 有时，他们收费过高或者要不给我修我一直在给钱的那些零部件。

sentences.sContent: ...It prompted employees to overcharge for work and to complete unnecessary repairs on a companywide basis...

synos.tran: [电]过度充电；[交]超载；装药过多

words.tran: 对…之资本估价过高；过分投资于
